          <title>
            <string language="en">Metals as good conductors of electricity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metalle als gute Leiter von Elektrizität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Métaux en tant que bons conducteurs de 
l'électricité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Metais como condutores bons da eletricidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metalli come buoni conduttori di elettricità</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Metales como buenos conductores de la 
electricidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a closed circuit where a material is tested for its electrical conductivity.</string>
          </description>

geprüft wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à un circuit fermé où

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a um circuito fechado

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra ad un circuito

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κλειστό κύκλωμα όπου

            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a circuito cerrado
